title: Aw khawiah nge an awm Lal hnathawktu
lyrics:
Aw, khawiah nge an awm Lal hnathawktu,
Tlang leh phaia buh awm seng khawm tur chu;
An favah, thutak kha rawn kengte chu,
Thawh zawh hma lohva chawl duh lote chu?

Khaw nge thawktute, tu nge chhuak ang,
Buhte an tilh tlak zawh hmaa at zova'n?
Tu nge rawn pui dawn, chhek khawm turin,
Phaitual leh tlangrama buh awm hi?

Kil tin leh ram tin va zawng chhuak ta la,
Hnim sei mah se, buh zawng i hmu zel ang;
Hlohvin hmaihthelh suh la, pakhat te pawh,
Kan Lalpa zemah rawn seng lut vek rawh.

Buhte an eng a, an hmin zo ta e,
Tunah hnathawktute chauh an nghak e;
Hnathawktu an thlem, hnathawh tur a tam,
An thawh thuai loh chuan tam tak an bo dawn.

Tichuan, lo kal r'u, favah rawn kengin,
Kan Lalpa buhte seng khawm zo turin;
Kan Lalpa lo kal thlenga thawk turin,
A hnena kum
khuuaa ruai theh turin.
